description: The Logitech G Pro X is a compact and customizable mechanical gaming keyboard designed for professional gamers. It features hot-swappable switches and customizable RGB lighting.
system_requirements: Windows 7/8/10, USB port, Logitech G HUB software

description: The Corsair K70 RGB MK.2 is a premium mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX switches and vibrant RGB backlighting. It offers dedicated media controls and a durable aluminum frame.
system_requirements: Windows 7/8/10, USB port, Corsair iCUE software

description: The Razer BlackWidow Elite is a full-sized mechanical gaming keyboard featuring Razer's Green switches and customizable RGB lighting. It includes dedicated media controls and a magnetic wrist rest.
system_requirements: Windows 7/8/10, USB port, Razer Synapse software

description: The SteelSeries Apex Pro is a high-performance mechanical gaming keyboard with adjustable mechanical switches and customizable RGB lighting. It offers a magnetic wrist rest for comfort during long gaming sessions.
system_requirements: Windows 7/8/10, USB port, SteelSeries Engine software

description: The HyperX Alloy FPS Pro is a tenkeyless mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX switches, designed for FPS gamers. It features a solid steel frame for durability.
The ASUS ROG Strix Scope is a mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX switches and customizable RGB lighting. It features an extended Ctrl key for FPS gaming.
system_requirements: Windows 7/8/10, USB port, ASUS Armoury Crate software

description: The Corsair K95 RGB Platinum is a premium mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX switches, dedicated macro keys, and customizable RGB backlighting.
system_requirements: Windows 7/8/10, USB port, Corsair iCUE software

description: The Roccat Vulcan 120 AIMO is a mechanical gaming keyboard with Titan switches and customizable AIMO RGB lighting. It features a sleek aluminum top plate.
The Ducky One 2 Mini is a compact 60% mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX switches. It features customizable RGB lighting and a detachable USB-C cable.
The Cooler Master CK552 is a mechanical gaming keyboard with Gateron switches and customizable RGB lighting. It features a brushed aluminum top plate.
